title: Quis custodiet ipsos custodies?
content:
[[module css]]
#st-action-area a:empty::before {
  content: "(empty link)";
  color: green;
}
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="-fragment -log-of-anomalous-items-cn -short-stories" tags="-scp -wanderers -mcd-curios -ci -故事 -goi格式 -艺术作品 -中心 -指导 -文章 -样版 -版式 -作者 -竞赛 -待删除 -待刪除 -重写中 -补充材料 -段落 -新闻 -工房 -管理 -掩藏页 -草稿 -_无分类" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

-----

[[module css]]
@import url("http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--code/tag-check/1");
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="+ 标签检查" hideLocation="both"]]

[[module TagCloud limit="99999" maxColor="255,0,0" minColor="255,0,0" showHidden="true" target="system:page-tags"]]

[[/collapsible]]

[!-----

[[module CSS]]
.image-checker .list-pages-item { display: flex; flex-direction: row-reverse; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; border-top: 1px solid black; margin-top: -1px; }

.image-checker .list-pages-item p { display: none; flex: 1; }
.image-checker .list-pages-item img + p { display: block; }
.image-checker .list-pages-item a + p { display: block; }

.image-checker .list-pages-item > img { max-width: 30%; max-height: 200px; }
.image-checker .list-pages-item a { max-width: 30%; max-height: 200px; }
.image-checker .list-pages-item a > img { max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; }
.image-checker .list-pages-item img { margin: 2px; }
[[/module]]

[[div_ class="image-checker"]]
[[module ListPages category="*" tags="-scp -故事 -艺术作品 -作者" perPage="250" order="created_at" range="@URL|." separate="yes"]]
[[image :first]]

%%title_linked%% by %%created_by%%, %%created_at%%
tags: %%_tags_linked%% %%tags%%
[[/module]]
[[/div]]--]

-----

[[module ListPages category="log-of-anomalous-items-cn short-stories" rating="<=-4" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

-----

[[collapsible show="+ 版式检查" hideLocation="both"]]

[[module ListPages category="theme" perPage="250" order="title" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="component" tags="+版式 -原创" perPage="250" order="title" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="component theme" tags="+版式 +原创" perPage="250" order="title" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]

-----

[[module ListPages category="-adult -wanderers-adult -old" tags="+成人内容 -掩藏页" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.adult-box .list-pages-box > div > a,
.adult-box .list-pages-box > div > a:not(.newpage) + span {
  display: none;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="adult-box"]]

[[module ListPages category="adult" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
[[div_]]
[[[%%name%%]]][[span]]%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="wanderers-adult" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
[[div_]]
[[[wanderers:%%name%%]]][[span]]%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="_default" tags="+成人内容 +掩藏页" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
[[div_]]
[[[adult:%%name%%]]][[span]]%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages category="wanderers" tags="+成人内容 +掩藏页" perPage="250" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" separate="no"]]
[[div_]]
[[[wanderers-adult:%%name%%]]][[span]]%%index%%. %%category%%: %%title_linked%% ([[#ifexpr %%rating%% > 0 | + |  ]]%%rating%%) (%%tags%%)[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
author: Sekai_s
